overview: The tawdry tales and hard luck stories keep coming on his couch. Jessie Jane likes to screw her gardener before pounding it out with her husband. Erik Everhard gets down with his juicy little secretary, while slutty shopaholic Samantha likes to show off her obsession with fresh, new sex toys. The lewd confessions never end for a hot stud like him. Want to come and sit on his couch too?
tagline: Some secrets have to be shared.
title: Couch Confessions
